channel.title: 2handers crash my client
channel.description: im using taylor which i think is world 8 based and when i try a hold a 2 handed wep it crashes my client but they work on my testscape server so i compaired the clients and nothing is different about 2handers so can some1 help me please when it crashes it looks like [url=http://img159.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshot02082006120706ri4.png][img=http://img159.imageshack.us/img159/3629/screenshot02082006120706ri4.th.png][/url] Hallys re fine its jst 2handers
